text: Peter Gilmore (August 25, 1931 - February 3, 2013) was a British actor. He was known for his roles in Warlords of Atlantis, The Onedin Line, and in Oh! What A Lovely War. Gilmore was born on August 25, 1931 in Leipzig, Germany to British parents. He was raised in North Riding of Yorkshire. He was married to Una Stubbs from 1958 until they divorced in 1969. Then he was married to Jan Waters from 1970 until they divorced in 1976. Then he was married to Anne Stallybrass from 1987 until his death in 2013. He had a son with Stubbs. Gilmore died on February 3, 2013 in his home in London, England, aged 81.Stuart Jeffries (6 February 2013) Peter Gilmore obituary, The Guardian He is not related to British actress Susan Gilmore. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Anne Stallybrass and Peter Gilmore A site dedicated to the actors Anne Stallybrass and Peter Gilmore. title: Peter Gilmore
